pr_title: CompletionStageFactory for general consumption by JAX-RS

timeline.bodyText: Would a multi-release jar work here? Usually, I think MR jars are more work (dual maintenance) than they're worth, but maybe this case might be more beneficial?

replies.bodyText: Yes - good idea - that could be a way to further improve it, but I'll leave that sort thing up to the performance team for future consideration.
